title: Rahu Transit in the 6th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your 6th house strengthens competitiveness, problem-solving ability, and the drive to overcome obstacles. This phase sharpens focus on work routines, conflicts, health discipline, and daily responsibilities. You may feel compelled to dominate rivals, restructure habits, or confront long-pending issues head-on. While this transit can bring success in competitive environments and strategic victories, it may also increase stress, unhealthy obsessions, or ethical compromises. Conscious discipline and integrity determine whether Rahu becomes a tool for mastery or exhaustion.

sections.heading: Work & Daily Routine
points: Strong urge to control and optimize work systems
Ability to handle complex or high-pressure tasks
Unconventional methods improve efficiency
Overwork risk if balance is ignored

sections.heading: Competition & Conflicts
points: High drive to defeat rivals and critics
Strategic thinking in disputes and negotiations
Hidden enemies may surface
Victory depends on ethical clarity

sections.heading: Health & Discipline
points: Focus on fixing long-standing health issues
Tendency toward extreme routines or habits
Stress may affect digestion or nerves
Consistency matters more than intensity

sections.heading: Service & Responsibility
points: Desire to prove usefulness through results
Work may involve crisis management roles
Service becomes transactional rather than emotional
Need to avoid burnout from over-commitment

sections.heading: Mental Patterns & Control
points: Mindset becomes problem-oriented and tactical
Obsessive thinking around efficiency or flaws
Difficulty relaxing mentally
Mindful pauses restore clarity

closing: Rahu in the 6th house empowers you to conquer challenges through strategy and discipline. Balanced effort ensures lasting victories without self-damage.
